    1: import importlib
    2: 
    3: try:
    4:     import importlib.util
    5: except ImportError:
    6:     pass
    7: 
    8: 
    9: try:
   10:     module_from_spec = importlib.util.module_from_spec
   11: except AttributeError:
   12:     def module_from_spec(spec):
   13:         return spec.loader.load_module(spec.name)
